scripts.serve: webpack --mode development --devtool eval-cheap-source-map --watch & JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.preview: webpack --mode production --no-devtool --watch & JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build: webpack --mode production && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
